attributes.title: 2017 Chevrolet Utility 1.4 Club

attributes.description:
You can see why double cab bakkies are so popular. Not only can they cart the family around, but they can also double as a work or play vehicles when required.
Our 3.2 develops 147kW of power and 470Nm of torque, the latter from a low 1750 revs. It has an 80-litre tank and fuel consumption for this model is rated at 9.2 litres/100km.
It sits on 265/65 17-in alloys and has braked towing capacity of 3500kg --which is as good as it gets. Gross Combined Mass (GCM) is 6000kg and maximum towball download is 350kg.
The BT-50 scores a full five stars for safety from ANCAP, with six airbags and a whole suite of safety technologies including DSC, ABS, EBD and EBA. Load Adaptive Control (LAC) and Trailer Sway Control (TSC) are also fitted. The latter controls the speeds of rotation of the vehicle's left and right-hand wheels in order to suppress swaying.
One of the better double cabs out there and this specific Mazda BT 50 DCab is a 1 Owner vehicle with full service history at the Agents.

Finance available and
Trade ins welcome.
attributes.title: 2014 Mazda BT-50 3.2 TDi SLE Double-Cab
